actions.name: CreatePerformanceAnalysisReport
actions.description: Grants permission to call CreatePerformanceAnalysisReport API to create a Performance Analysis Report for a specified DB instance

actions.name: DeletePerformanceAnalysisReport
actions.description: Grants permission to call DeletePerformanceAnalysisReport API to delete a Performance Analysis Report for a specified DB instance

actions.name: DescribeDimensionKeys
actions.description: Grants permission to call DescribeDimensionKeys API to retrieve the top N dimension keys for a metric for a specific time period

actions.name: GetDimensionKeyDetails
actions.description: Grants permission to call GetDimensionKeyDetails API to retrieve the attributes of the specified dimension group

actions.name: GetPerformanceAnalysisReport
actions.description: Grants permission to call GetPerformanceAnalysisReport API to retrieve a Performance Analysis Report for a specified DB instance

actions.name: GetResourceMetadata
actions.description: Grants permission to call GetResourceMetadata API to retrieve the metadata for different features

actions.name: GetResourceMetrics
actions.description: Grants permission to call GetResourceMetrics API to retrieve PI metrics for a set of data sources, over a time period

actions.name: ListAvailableResourceDimensions
actions.description: Grants permission to call ListAvailableResourceDimensions API to retrieve the dimensions that can be queried for each specified metric type on a specified DB instance

actions.name: ListAvailableResourceMetrics
actions.description: Grants permission to call ListAvailableResourceMetrics API to retrieve metrics of the specified types that can be queried for a specified DB instance

actions.name: ListPerformanceAnalysisReports
actions.description: Grants permission to call ListPerformanceAnalysisReports API to list Performance Analysis Reports for a specified DB instance

actions.name: ListTagsForResource
actions.description: Grants permission to call ListTagsForResource API to list tags for a resource

actions.name: TagResource
actions.description: Grants permission to call TagResource API to tag a resource

actions.name: UntagResource
actions.description: Grants permission to call UntagResource API to untag a resource
